problem_text_cn: 如图是用杠杆撬石头的示意图,C是支点,当用力压杠杆的A端时,杠杆绕C点转动,另一端B向上翘起,石头就被撬动．现有一块石头,要使其滚动,杠杆的B端必须向上翘起10cm,已知杠杆的动力臂AC与阻力臂BC之比为5:1,则要使这块石头滚动,至少要将杠杆的A端向下压()
problem_text_en: The figure is a schematic diagram of prying a rock with a lever. C is the fulcrum. When end A of the lever is pressed hard, the lever rotates around point C, and the other end B is tilted upwards, and the rock is pried. There is a rock. To make it roll, the B end of the lever must be tilted up by N_0. Knowing that the ratio of the lever's power arm AC to the resistance arm BC is N_1:N_2, the rock must be rolled, at least the lever A End down()
